price: (97) They said, "O our father, ask for us forgiveness of our sins; indeed, we have been sinners."
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَا ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا خَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā is'taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭiīna
